com.uvce.cse.searchiot.encodeont.query

Class OntologyDetails

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.uvce.cse.searchiot.encodeont.util.JenaUtils
      • com.uvce.cse.searchiot.encodeont.query.OntologyDetails
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EncodeOntology

    public class OntologyDetails
extends JenaUtils
    This class is used to extract information from the ontology.
    Semantic-Knowledge in the ontology is extracted into the CSV files. Classes are encoded with a unique number, based on the hierarchy.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Santosh Pattar, Dwaraka Kulkarni
